descriptionMdByRank.1:
Increases ATK by **12%**.
Dealing damage to targets under Tune Strain - Interfered grants **6%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 3s, stacking up to 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.
descriptionMdByRank.2:
Increases ATK by **15%**.
Dealing damage to targets under Tune Strain - Interfered grants **6.7%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 3s, stacking up to 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.

Dealing damage to targets under Tune Strain - Interfered grants **8.2%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 3s, stacking up to 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.
